item.title: Welcome To My Blog!
item.description: Hi Welcome to my Blog! I am Ethan Morgan and here are some of my notes!.

item.title: My Journey: High School to Amazon
LoRa: Low Rank Adaptation of Large Language Models Paper Review
item.description: LoRa: Low Rank Adaptation of Large Language Models Paper Review Here is the paper I will be writing about today. LoRa: Low-Rank Adaptation of Large Language Models Paper 1.

item.title: The 2023 AWS Layoffs and Personal Insights
item.description: In an unprecedented turn of events, Amazon Web Services (AWS) recently faced a round of layoffs. This is a first in the history of AWS, marking a break from the past when even the tumultuous times of the 2008 financial crisis saw no layoffs at Amazon.

item.title: I felt the World Change: The Release of ChatGPT
item.description: On December 1st, 2022, I watch the world change. As I sat in front of my computer, I couldnâ€™t believe my eyes. As I continued to use chatGPT, I was struck by how intuitive and user-friendly it was.

item.title: My Hello World
item.description: Does it ever start without a Hello World?.
